rules_text:
[i]Sanctuary[/i] – Nemuno Sakata gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
[i]Adopt and raise[/i] – Whenever a player discards a creature card, create a 1/1 red and black Youkai creature token.
flavor_text: [i]“It's gonna get freezing cold up here on the mountain. You should come an' have some tea! C'mon, don't be shy!”[/i]
